definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化学镀法，甲醛为还原剂，制备镀银羰基铁粉。

sentences.english: The result of the novel reductive applied to the he copper anode-furnace in Jinchang Smelter is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍新型还原剂在金昌冶炼厂铜阳极炉上的应用效果。

sentences.english: Reductant in the reaction of elements in valence increased.
sentences.chinese: 在反应中还原剂中元素的化合价升高。

sentences.english: The plant added carbamide as reducer into calciner continuously.
sentences.chinese: 该工厂使用尿素作为还原剂，向分解炉内连续加入。

sentences.english: Reduction of tertiary amides to amines with combined reducing agents was studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用具有强活性的复合还原剂实现了叔酰胺的还原。

sentences.english: Here, ethanol is developed to be nontoxic reductant.
sentences.chinese: 发展了乙醇作为一种无毒的还原剂。

sentences.english: Saturated cyclic steroid and terpenoid compound is the better reductant.
sentences.chinese: 含有饱和环的甾萜类是良好的还原剂。

sentences.english: All four preferred electroless baths use hypophosphite as a reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 所有四个优先使用化学浴次磷酸钠作为还原剂。

sentences.english: The process for removing the chromium from the silicon steel plant wastewaters was studied by using sodium sulfite as reducer.
sentences.chinese: 用亚硫酸钠为还原剂对硅钢含铬废水进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: L-cysteine is also a reducing agent.
sentences.chinese: 半胱氨酸也是一种还原剂。

sentences.english: The present invention provides a reducer nozzle used for denitration by an SNCR method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种用于SNCR法脱硝的还原剂喷嘴。

sentences.english: Oxidizing agent and reducing agent make Iris typhifolia Kitag solution decline to colorless.
sentences.chinese: 氧化剂和还原剂会迅速使北陵鸢尾色素溶液降至无色。

sentences.english: Formaldehyde is a strong reducing agent, could be removed by oxidant.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛是强还原剂，可用氧化剂将其去除。

sentences.english: The chemical reductants fail to reduce carbonyl group under ambient conditions.
sentences.chinese: 羰基在一般条件下不易被化学还原剂还原。

sentences.english: A new technology for preparation of basic chromium sulfate, using sugar as a reductive agent to sodium dichromate, was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 以红矾钠为原料，蔗糖为还原剂，制备了碱式硫酸铬。

sentences.english: Arsenical compounds are not compatible with reducing agents.
sentences.chinese: 含砷化合物与还原剂不能共用。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
